summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling its resolutions 955 (1994), 1165 (1998) and 1329 (2000),
 forwards to the General Assembly the nominations for judges of the International Tribunal for Rwanda as follows: 
Mr. Mouinou Aminou (Benin), 
Mr. Frederick Mwela Chomba (Zambia), 
Mr. Winston Churchill Matanzima Maqutu (Lesotho), 
Mr. Harris Michael Mtegha (Malawi), 
Ms. Arlette Ramaroson (Madagascar).
